attributes.action: The BBC should be abolished,as it no longer represents the UK population
attributes.additional_details: The government and parliament are the only people able to alter the BBC Charter and ensure going forward that no one party can ever hijack the agenda again
attributes.background:
For many years the BBC has been dominated by a left wing agenda and no longer represents the views of the majority population of the UK
The time has come to abolish the BBC and replace it with a new national broadcaster who represents all views across the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We understand you'd like the BBC Charter to be changed to create a different national broadcaster but we're not sure how you'd like the broadcaster to change. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189
